name: Hazel's Hexenhaus (BUGGY)
description:
NOTES:

We ran into bugs after submitting, we will upload a fixed version in the next few days. We wanted to keep this one up, because we worked really hard on it. :(

Introduction

This game was created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2002. We are a programmer and artist couple and together collaborated on all assets, sounds and gameplay. We worked really hard on the game and hope you enjoy it!

Gameplay Instructions:

Hazel's had a hard day and now she's missing a few ingredients to conjure up something to eat. Explore her world and help friends along the way.  Play 3 relaxing arcade minigames, andd you might just find what you need.

Game Controls:

A+D to move Left and Right

Space to interact

Stitching Game:

Left Click to stitch

Right click to undo stitch
